tasks.docker:ubuntu:shell: deno task docker:ubuntu:build && script -q /dev/null bash -lc "docker run --rm -it -v "$(pwd)":/dotfiles -w /dotfiles --entrypoint /bin/bash md:test-ubuntu -l"
tasks.docker:fedora:shell: deno task docker:fedora:build && script -q /dev/null bash -lc "docker run --rm -it -v "$(pwd)":/dotfiles -w /dotfiles --entrypoint /bin/bash md:test-fedora -l"
tasks.docker:ubuntu:test: deno task docker:ubuntu:build && docker run --rm -v "$(pwd)":/dotfiles -w /dotfiles md:test-ubuntu
tasks.docker:fedora:test: deno task docker:fedora:build && docker run --rm -v "$(pwd)":/dotfiles -w /dotfiles md:test-fedora
tasks.docker:ubuntu:bare:shell: deno task docker:ubuntu:bare:build && docker run --rm -it -w /root md:bare-ubuntu
tasks.docker:fedora:bare:shell: deno task docker:fedora:bare:build && docker run --rm -it -w /root md:bare-fedora
tasks.docker:ubuntu:bare:install: deno task docker:ubuntu:bare:build && docker run --rm -w /root md:bare-ubuntu bash -lc 'curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/wcygan/mini-dotfiles/refs/heads/main/install.sh | sh'
tasks.docker:fedora:bare:install: deno task docker:fedora:bare:build && docker run --rm -w /root md:bare-fedora bash -lc 'curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/wcygan/mini-dotfiles/refs/heads/main/install.sh | sh'
tasks.test:all: deno task test:mac && deno task docker:ubuntu:test && deno task docker:fedora:test
